Verify the 'Price' table header column displays text 'Price' with font size 14px, font weight 600, color #495057, text align 'right', 12px padding, background color #e9ecef, 1px solid border bottom color #dee2e6, and 1px solid border left color #dee2e6
Verify the 'Settings' dropdown menu item displays text 'Settings' with font size 16px, color #212529, background color #ffffff, and 8px 16px padding
